TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NoMatchingPrincipalException extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalException

Docs.summary: This exception is thrown when no matching principal object could be found with the specified parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> class. The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error. This message takes into account the current system culture. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"> class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of . If is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of . If is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
